content.question: Analyze the ways in which the arts in the period from 1870 to 1939 reflected new conceptions of the individual. (Historical thinking skill: Causation)

frqParts.text: Analyze the ways in which the arts in the period from 1870 to 1939 reflected new conceptions of the individual. (Historical thinking skill: Causation)

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
